page.title: 13BRAILES-ADULT ORGANISATIONS
page.content: Meet at the Village Hall: {Monthly:}Women's Institute: for women of all ages.1985 membership-50. Parish Council: Seven elected members. {Twice Monthly:}The Feldon Club -talks and entertainment for the over 60's. Meet at the Institute: {Monthly:}Brailes Mechanical and Craft Society:interest in machinery,craft and local history. Meet at the Methodist Church:{ {Weekly:}Methodist Women's Fellowship Meet at the Free School,Lower Brailes. {Monthly:}Mother's Union Parish Fellowship {Twice Weekly:}Brailes Silver Band-5 adult and 19 junior members. Royal British Legion-meet quarterly at the George Hotel. Women's Section meet 3 times/year at the Village Hall. {Sports Clubs:}Tennis,Badminton,Cricket and Football.
